description: This portable and sleek PLEMO Magic Cube Bluetooth Speaker is your perfect companion while you are on the go. It allows you to stream music from any Bluetooth-enabled devices via wireless connection, including smartphones, touch screen tablets, laptops, and more. The line-in capability also enables you to connect the speaker directly to a non-Bluetooth-enabled device using the 3.5mm audio cable. The award-winning cube design is sure to make the speaker the focus of attention, and the sound of superb quality will definitely keep you and your friends entertained.Package Contents:PLEMO Magic Cube Bluetooth SpeakerUSB charging cable3.5mm Audio CableInstruction ManualSpecifications:Bluetooth Version: 3.0Working Frequency: 2.4 GHzOutput Power: 3 WSignal to Noise Ratio: 82 dBBattery Voltage: 3.7 VCharging Voltage: 5 VBattery Charge Time: ~2 hBluetooth Working Distance: 30 ftPlaytime: ~4-6 h, depending on the volumeCompatible With:The speaker is compatible with all devices that transfer sound via Bluetooth, or with a 3.5mm audio jack cable.Cell phones: Apple iPhone, HTC, Samsung Galaxy, Droid, Nokia Lumia, Google Nexus, Blackberry, etcTablets: Apple iPads, Google Nexus, Samsung Galaxy, Microsoft Surface, Blackberry Playbook, etcMP3 Players: Apple iPod etcLaptops: Apple MacBooks, Dell, Lenovo, Acer, HP, Sony, Toshiba, etcCD/DVD PlayersPC Desktops & iMacs
title: PLEMO Magic Cube Rechargeable Portable Bluetooth Wireless Speaker with 3.5mm Audio Port for iPhones, iPads, Android Cell Phones, Touch Screen Tablets, MacBooks, Laptop Computers, MP3 Players & Portable CD/DVD Players, Black
